org.pebble.types.uuid

Class UUIDIntEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pebble.types.TypeIntEncoder<T>
      • org.pebble.types.TypeMapEncoder<UUID>
        • org.pebble.types.uuid.UUIDIntEncoder

  • public class UUIDIntEncoder
extends TypeMapEncoder<UUID>
    Class used to encode a list of UUID types into a list of integers that can be compressed by the core pebble functionality.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.pebble.types.TypeMapEncoder

      Store the 64 most significant bits and the 64 least significant bits as longs binary representation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UUIDIntEncoder

        public UUIDIntEncoder(int referenceWindowSize,
                      OutputBitStream outputBitStream,
                      PebbleOffsetsStoreWriter offsetsStore,
                      EncodingInfo encodingInfo)
        Parameters:
        referenceWindowSize - size of the maximum size of the list index between current list and its encoded value list index.
        outputBitStream - output stream where a new encoded element will be written.
        offsetsStore - stores the current offset after each element is written.
        encodingInfo - encodingInfo used to keep track of relevant encoding information.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        protected int write(UUID element)
             throws IOException
        Store the 64 most significant bits and the 64 least significant bits as longs binary representation.
        Specified by:
        write in class TypeMapEncoder<UUID>
        Parameters:
        element - to be written.
        Returns:
        numbers of bits used to write the encoded element.
        Throws:
        IOException - when there is an exception writing element.
